title.bibl: Lietuva, Oct. 5, 1917. St. George's Parish Marks Twenty-Fifth Anniversary

div.bibl: Lietuva, Oct. 5, 1917. ST. GEORGE'S PARISH MARKS TWENTY-FIFTH ANNIVERSARY

body.p: St. George's Lithuanian Roman Catholic Parish, which is located in the Bridgeport district of Chicago, commemorated its twenty-fifth anniversary this week. The Parish was founded in 1892. In connection with the commemoration, an exhibit and bazaar were held in the Parish hall, 32nd Place and Auburn [now Lituanica] Avenue.
